name: Zombie Sniper: Shooting Surviv
description:
You and your sniper rifle are the only survivors of a zombie infection. In this zombie death free shooter game a virus infected the whole world except you. Your entire city is infected and blood is everywhere. Shooting zombies in the head to be the best killer of the city and survive, or just become another zombie like them. In zombie sniper gun shooting 3D city game you will need to manage your gunship and bullets and kill every undead before they drive you to death!

FEATURES
- 3D shooting zombie environment
- Stunning HD zombie frontier shoot target graphics
- Captivating soundtrack and effects strike zombie
- One of the most kill dead zombie objective epic weapons and arsenal
- Distinctive zombies
- Thrilling battle scenes
